.. index:: LieSquareMatrix

.. _l4c69655371756172654d6174726978:

LieSquareMatrix(n, R)
=====================

:viewcode:`lie.spad line 109 <lie.spad#L109>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <lie.spad#L109>`

* n: \ :ref:`PositiveInteger <l506f736974697665496e7465676572>`\ 

* R: \ :ref:`CommutativeRing <l436f6d6d7574617469766552696e67>`\ 


LieSquareMatrix(\ ``n``\ , \ ``R``\ ) implements the Lie algebra of the \ ``n``\  by \ ``n``\  matrices over the commutative ring \ ``R``\ . The Lie bracket (commutator) of the algebra is given by \ ``a*b := (a *\$SQMATRIX(n, R) b - b *\$SQMATRIX(n, R) a)``\ , where \ :spadfun:`*\$SQMATRIX(\ ``n``\ , \ ``R``\ )`\  is the usual matrix multiplication.


.. _l4c69655371756172654d6174726978-30:

\ :ref:`0 <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964-30>`\ \: % 
  from \ :ref:`AbelianMonoid <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\
